body: she didn’t bang the other guy, he thought he did at 1st which is why he got mad at her but turns out she’s working at a store right next to it because she wanted to buy a phone
That's good then, that makes this much more wholesome
@Stck that happens in the previous chapter to this one.

@Stck That was her going to a sports club that she works part-time. The author tried to fool the reader. The MC states that he later found out it was her going to her job that happened to be near the love hotel.

This is the third story in a series. What sucks is that the second one heavily implies shes hooking up with another guy until the MC tells her to go out with him, and I dont think they ever clear that up and explain.
